description: Located in Dhaka, 2.7 km from UITS, APPAYAN GUEST HOUSE BARIDHARA provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The property is around 3.4 km from Consulate of Singapore, 3.5 km from Armed Forces Medical College and 3.5 km from Primeasia University. The accommodation offers room service and an ATM for guests. At the guest house, every room comes with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all units at APPAYAN GUEST HOUSE BARIDHARA have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms include a balcony. At the accommodation, each room is equipped with a seating area.Southeast University is 3.6 km from APPAYAN GUEST HOUSE BARIDHARA, while AIUB is 3.7 km away. The nearest airport is Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport, 5 km from the guest house.

location.address: Kalachandpur Main Road 9, Cafe Jill,resturent circle, 42 (Floor 4)

description: Hotel Grand Park Barishal has a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Barisāl. With a fitness center, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. There is free private parking and the property has paid airport shuttle service. The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Hotel Grand Park Barishal provides certain accommodations with city views, and rooms have a balcony.Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, continental and Full English/Irish options.  Speaking Bengali, English, Hindi and Urdu at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.The nearest airport is Barisal Airport,15 km from the accommodation.Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 9.6 for a two-person trip.

location.address: Bangabandhu Udyan (Bell's Park) Band Road, 8200 Barisāl, Bangladesh – Great location

description: Asian SR Hotel is 100 m from Chittagong’s main bus stand (BRTC) and Chittagong’s main railway station. The hotel houses a restaurant and offers 24-hour room service.Located in the heart of the city center, the hotel is a 25-minute drive from the Shah Amanat International Airport.Fitted with a small seating area rooms feature satellite TV and a wardrobe. The attached bathroom comes with hot and cold water supply.Free internet access is available in the business center and in select rooms. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist with luggage storage, same-day laundry service and currency exchange services. Other facilities include meeting rooms and a tour desk.Open from breakfast through dinner, Asian SR’s restaurant serves Indian dishes, along with Thai, Chinese and European favorites.

location.address: 291 Station Road, 4000 Chittagong, Bangladesh – Great location.

description: Jatra Flagship Khulna City Centre is a 4-star property located in Khulna. This 4-star hotel offers a shared kitchen and a shared lounge. The property provides room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests.At the hotel each room comes with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a city view. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge.Guests at Jatra Flagship Khulna City Centre can enjoy a continental or an Asian breakfast.The nearest airport is Jessore, 64.4 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.Solo travelers in particular like the location – they rated it 8.5 for a one-person stay.

location.address: Road: 06 Sonadanga R/A 01 Flat # 5A & 5B, House # 30, ECO Chehra, 9100 Khulna, Bangladesh

description: Located in Rājshāhi, Hotel Bonolota international offers 2-star accommodations with a terrace. This 2-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel has family rooms.The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries.The nearest airport is Shah Makhdum Airport, 10 km from the hotel.

Grand Palace Hotel & Resorts Rangpur features a fitness center, garden, a terrace and bar in Rangpur. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. The property provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transportation, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.At the hotel every room is equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Each room has an electric tea pot, while selected rooms have a balcony and others also provide guests with city views. At Grand Palace Hotel & Resorts Rangpur all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.A buffet, à la carte or continental breakfast is served at the property. At the accommodation you'll find a restaurant serving Chinese, British and French cuisine. Vegetarian and halal options can also be requested.The nearest airport is Saidpur Airport, 43.5 km from Grand Palace Hotel & Resorts Rangpur.

description: ABAB MONJIL is offering accommodations in Sylhet. There's a terrace and guests can use free WiFi and free private parking.Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower, all rooms at the guesthouse have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms also feature a balcony.The nearest airport is Osmani International Airport, 10 km from ABAB MONJIL.

Located in Dhaka, 2.4 km from Consulate of Singapore, Aristocrat Inn has accommodations with a fitness center, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers a business center and a concierge service. The property provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transportation, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Aristocrat Inn rooms contain bed linen and towels.A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast is available each morning at the property. At the accommodation you'll find a restaurant serving Chinese, British and Greek cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested.Popular points of interest near Aristocrat Inn include Primeasia University, Southeast University and AIUB. The nearest airport is Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport, 6.9 km from the hotel.

description: Jatra Flagship Chattogram City Centre is a 4-star property set in Chittagong. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk.At the hotel all rooms come with air conditioning, a desk, a balcony with a city view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. The units will provide guests with a fridge.Asian and halal breakfast options are available every morning at Jatra Flagship Chattogram City Centre.The nearest airport is Shah Amanat International Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 9.6 for a two-person trip.

description: Offering a barbecue and terrace, Nirvana Inn is set in Sylhet City Center. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Free private parking is available on site.A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is provided. Certain units have a seating area where you can relax. For your comfort, you will find slippers and a hairdryer. Nirvana Inn Hotel features free WiFi throughout the property.There is a 24-hour front desk and hairdresser's at the property.You can play table tennis at this hotel, and bike hire and car hire are available.

Located in Dhaka, a 4-minute walk from Primeasia University, Hotel Omni Residency Dhaka has accommodations with a fitness center, free private parking and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. The property provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transportation, room service and free WiFi.The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, an electric tea pot, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Omni Residency Dhaka rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.A buffet, à la carte or continental breakfast is available each morning at the property. At the accommodation you'll find a restaurant serving African, American and Argentinian cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested.

description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Golden Inn Chattagram Ltd offers accommodations in Chittagong. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. It is 100 m from the Chittagong Railway Station.Rooms include a flat screen TV and a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Each room is fitted with a private bathroom.There is a 24-hour front desk and a concierge desk at the property. Services like laundry and dry cleaning are provided.

City Inn is located in Chittagong. The hotel also provides free WiFi and free private parking.Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast.Staff at City Inn are always available to provide information at the reception.The nearest airport is Shah Amanat International Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

The Peninsula Chittagong Limited is a 4-star property in Port City's upscale GEC Circle, a short 5-minute walk from Central Plaza shopping area. An outdoor pool, pampering spa treatments and a well-equipped fitness center are available. There is also a 24-hour front desk and free parking.The air-conditioned guestrooms all come with a flat-screen TV, mini-bar and personal safe. Separate smoking and nonsmoking floors are available. Private bathrooms are equipped with a shower The Peninsula Chittagong Limited is a 20-minute drive from Chittagong Railway Station. Chittagong International Airport is a 45-minute drive away.

Guests can enjoy city views.All guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a seating area and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The rooms include a desk. Grand Surma Hotel offers a buffet or Asian breakfast.Languages spoken at the reception include Bengali and English, and guests are invited to request guidance on the area when needed.
